website_summaries.verdict: Long lasting automatic toilet bowl cleaner tablet that's extremely easy to use.
pros: Claims to last up to 4 months
Does an excellent job of eliminating bacteria and keeping the toilet smelling fresher
Works better than expected for eliminating tough stains, even older stains
cons: Costs a little more than some drop-in tablet brands

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as well as another product that comes in a package with 8 tablets, to help control the ring/discoloration in the toilet bowls, in a home with 3 toilets total. It's doing the job well. The price has gone up by almost $2 since I bought it, though. But if it truly lasts for 2000 flushes it may be worth it, although the cheaper 8 tablets are also working well. The tablet gives the toilet bowl a chlorine/bleach odor which is noticeable but not objectionable. Would I buy it again? The jury is still out, I have to see how it lasts compared to the other product. But so far it's doing the job!
customer_reviews.author: The Lawn RangerTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this -- we had that pink ring just ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this -- we had that pink ring just at the water line (it's an airborne bacteria called serratia marcescens, which contributes to bladder infections -- among other ailments -- in hospitals). One of these a month gets rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Pilot Girl

customer_reviews.title: Does not work, it is not strong enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not work, it is not strong enough to clean. I cleaned my toiled completely with bleach, then put a tablet in the tank as instructed, and it did not keep my toilet bowel clean for any amount of time. Do not be fooled my the description on the back, it does not compare to clorox toilet bowl clean. Yes it is cheaper than clorox, but that is because it does not clean you toilet.
customer_reviews.author: MistressofAvalon

customer_reviews.title: Smells like bleach
customer_reviews.text: Smells like bleach every time you flush. That's an odor I enjoy when I've freshly scrubbed everything in the bathroom, but I'm not even certain it is a safe thing to inhale so frequently. We're going back to the blue kind that turns green when you urinate. Besides, why would a product have a germ fighting and cleaning duration disparity of two months?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey and smells like clorox
customer_reviews.text: Well I guess it's my fault that i didn't bother to read information as I'm just looking for something to helps the toilet clean instead of using the blue and white tablet that leave blue stain... I just think the price for 1 piece is too much
customer_reviews.author: Armie del Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Read description carefully
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the product I thought there was 2 in each package. There was only one I should have read it closer Expensive. I could have gone to a store and got it cheaper
customer_reviews.author: lindaw26

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet cleaner I’ve used so far
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a couple of tablet bowl cleaners and this one works the best so far. My city water often leaves a pale pinkish ring at the water line. I haven’t seen that line since using this tablet. Like all tablet cleaners, super easy to install in the water tank. I went ahead and added this product to my subscribe and save list.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Much Too Expensive - Be Careful What You're Ordering
customer_reviews.text: This product is too expensive. Take a note of what you're ordering - this is a SINGLE item, for use in a single toilet. I blame myself for not looking closely at the information provided, so I will use this single pack and learn my lesion. Read the information!
customer_reviews.author: turtlex

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: This hardly lasted a month. We have four people in the house with two adults and 2 kids. There is no way we flushed the toilet 2000 times. It hardly lasted 3 weeks. The price for $6 is too expensive for a single pack. I did not notice my toilet is any cleaner. Do not recommend buying this ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used other tablets before. Unlike the other tabs, I had NO accumulations within the toilet bowl that needed even a weekly cleaning. (I can't flush the toilet at night, because it would wake up my dad.) My only complaint is that since there is no coloration of the water, you don't know if the tablet is still there. I'm not counting the number of flushes, but it sure seems to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: This is an insanely good product for the price. If you have an older toilet, THIS IS THE PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This works waaaay better than I expected! I haven’t seen any mold build up or run down into the bowl at all after using this! I used to clean my toilet bowl every few days because it would slowly streak black and brown. Haven’t cleaned the bowl in two weeks now and it’s just as white! As for the smell it actually reminds me of a pool or something, and not really the overly potent bleach smell other products have. It’s so faint and lasts maybe 5 minutes after a flush in a tiny bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C

customer_reviews.title: SET IT AND FORGET IT!
customer_reviews.text: Dunno if it is actually working or not but the poo poo stains that get stuck to the percaline remove after a couple flushes now. They won't just continue to build up more and more over time. I used to ruin so many toilet brushes because I'd have to scrub and scrub and scrub until the bristles were totally brown. Not something you want your guests to see when the come over. After two weeks with this product in my tank, it's cut my poo poo scrubbing in half.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is creating more problems than fixing now there are awful streaks down our toilet bowl. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony S

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about a month, or 700 flushes.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a little over a month (35 days). That would work out to 57 flushes a day, but in reality the bathroom sees maybe 20 at peak. Doesn’t last as long as they claim.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pavelich

customer_reviews.title: Mith 2,000 flushes
customer_reviews.text: 2,000 flushes? Yeah right! Were gone in like a month and a half. And I just use the toilet once a day. So like 45 flushes I will say.... Wondering were are the remaining 1,955 flushes missing!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander E.

customer_reviews.title: Should be named "Almost 200 Flushes".
customer_reviews.text: This product is labeled as "grossly deceptive". They even want you to sign up for a "monthly delivery". I don't know any home that will flush a toilet 2000 times in a month. Must be from China.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Sumrall

customer_reviews.title: Complete Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I write few reviews; normally only when I'm very happy or unhappy with a product. This product, is a complete waste of money. The other 4 / 5 star reviews on here must be fake. This cake (or whatever you call it) was half the original size after 1 week. Then completely gone a day later. I figure once it was small enough, it went down the inlet from the tank into the toilet, then gone. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Philip LaScala

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize that this item came with only one tablet. It cost me $13... I was not allowed by Amazon to return it.
customer_reviews.author: May Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Lasted almost one month.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted almost one month. Not as described. Also, Still growing mold ring in toilet, yet not as bad. I wish this lasted longer as stated, so I could use regularly. Cost is very high.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Good, be careful putting it in
customer_reviews.text: It was easy enough to place, I think it’s working, I don’t smell it much so it isn’t overpowering. I just think I accidentally got some of it on my arm and I’ve had some serious contact dermatitis on it for a few days now, so wear a sleeve when you put this in, and you should be golden. Doesn’t hurt to have a cleaner toilet, right?
customer_reviews.author: Cara Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice! Keeps the toilet bowl clean with a low bleach smell. It's also noticeably clean with each flush. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: 2000 Flushes?
customer_reviews.text: Sure, you can get 2000 flushes, as long as you do it over a 5 day period... The 2000 flush claim is laughable. I had the tablet in my primary bathroom and it lasted for about 5 weeks. The only way you can get 2000 flushes is if you either live with 20 people using one toilet, or you have chronic diarrhea and never leave the bathroom. Happy with the "clean" smell, while it lasts, and it does work, but how dare you claim 2000 flushes when clearly it does not under even extreme use scenarios.
customer_reviews.author: Nanometer

customer_reviews.title: Keep toilets sparkling
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Our toilets had been ill taken care of by the previous owners so grow mold very easily. I was constantly fighting moldy rings and lines. With these the tank keeps clean for weeks and there is a nice faint clean "bleach" smell. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karl O.

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This product dissolved too quickly and created unsafe fumes. It may some thing in water. But I can us it
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the lil poopers
customer_reviews.text: If you have children these are wonderful! Keeps their small bathroom smelling like i just cleaned it! Sprays are annoying and don’t leave it smelling clean like bleach. And it helps with the crazy ring that kept popping up no matter how often i clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cozy Novel Reader

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like
customer_reviews.text: It has a very strong bleach scent, but it doesn't really do anything for my toilet.
customer_reviews.author: MIISSK

customer_reviews.title: Inferior packing
customer_reviews.text: The product is as advertised and is doing what is expected; however, the tablet came broken. Only one big piece then many small pieces and some powder. Not sure I'd recommend purchasing this via mail order.
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not too chemically!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate this being not too overly chemically, although in all fairness because of our work schedules in my home, the toilet never goes very long without being flushed. Still though, I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DACo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Isn’t this supposed to keep your toilet bowl at least semi-clean? It doesn’t. Waste of money, but it smells like bleach! In a good way! Just no visual evidence, which is the most important! My normal one was sold out, so I tried this one. Don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Kincade

customer_reviews.title: Poor product care
customer_reviews.text: The tablet was crushed into pieces in both packages. The box they came in was fine, as well as their individual boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work at all. 2nd time trying this. Will not ever try it again, its garbage
customer_reviews.author: bonemama55

customer_reviews.title: Working
customer_reviews.text: I haven't counted the flushes, but it is keeping the toilet clean. My cleaning lady comes only every two weeks, and the toilet needed cleaning more often. With this, it doesn't get nasty between cleanings.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Ammann (Lillie)

customer_reviews.title: Overpowering smell
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom reeks of bleach now. It came broken in bits so that may have something to do with it but there is a very unpleasant chemical smell in my bathroom thanks to this product
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.text: I went with this product because the Clorox tabs were so expensive. As they say, you get what you pay for. This product did nothing. Pay the extra money and get a product that works.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep bowl clean
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using toilet drops for years. First time trying this and very disappointed. Couldn’t even get through one month without cleaning which I’m not accustomed to
customer_reviews.author: ATL Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Toilet Clean Longer
customer_reviews.text: I used this to deal with the weird yellow rings that would form in the toilet. I'd never had that happen anywhere else I'd lived. It was like if I didn't clean the toilet literally every single day, there they'd be. Using this allowed me to go from cleaning every day to every week or two, which was much better. I cannot speak to any of the plumbing issues mentioned by other users because I was only in that apartment for four months and my new place doesn't have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Meg H.

customer_reviews.title: One in the box. I expected at least two for the price.
customer_reviews.text: One in the box. I expected at least two for the price. Can get multi packs of similar product for less than one of these. Never buying this trash again.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Clorox tablets if you want a clean toilet
customer_reviews.text: This product smells nice and that’s about it. Two weeks into use and the toilet looks like it did in day one. I’m going back to using Clorox toilet tablets, after day one the bowl is clean, only down side is you have to replace your toilet flapper once a year. Too me that’s a small price to pay for the quality of product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this package only contains 1 tablet. $8 for one tablet! I take responsibility for not thoroughly reading the description and just assuming that it was a multi pack for the price. But talk about price gouging, don't buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: LizS

customer_reviews.title: Stick with Clorox
customer_reviews.text: Smelled like chlorine in the bowl but does not clean as well as the Clorox tablets.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work and can’t smell it either. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell and eye irritant
customer_reviews.text: Works probably great but smells like a swimming pool and if you’re sensitive like we are do not use.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works well for months
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have any color so it's hard to be sure it's working, but knowing what a bowl usually ends up looking like after a two months or so and what it looks like with this product in the tank makes all the difference. It lasts months, compared to 8-packs of other products lasting just a few weeks. Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Rod B.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to open, drop in, and it goes to work. After I flush, there's a very faint scent of bleach. Not over by powering, but you know it's working. Don't seem like commode rim has to be scrubbed be so hard. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: judyB53

customer_reviews.title: This product just does not work.
customer_reviews.text: We cleaned our 2 toilets perfectly clean and dropped this product into the tanks in the proper position, after only a few weeks our toilets began to get very dirty. We would not recommend this poor quality product to anyone not ever!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Love the Product
customer_reviews.text: I almost missed this because the packers buried it in a box with cat litter..please ship separately people
customer_reviews.author: Grannie Cats

customer_reviews.title: Mold grew ON the tablet
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these tablets did not help keep my toilets clean. I actually had mold spots growing directly on at least one of the three I purchased. I wound up removing them from toilets and replacing with Chlorox brand tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Amy On Fyre

customer_reviews.title: Worked so well, i didnt clean the toilet for months! And no ring! No smell!
customer_reviews.text: Worked so well, i didnt clean the toilet for months! And no ring! No smell! I was a little surprised at the price but still would recommend it , even over the name brand Clorox one. I just purchased the Clorox brand (for the same price, but came in box of 3), so thought it would be a better bargain. But I've been noticing a horrible smell of bleach or just something chemical. Would recommend this over Clorox for sure!
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This works really well despite my hard water. Works better than other similar products I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Smell good!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I don’t think it last 2000 flushes, it didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklin Reel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: These tablets don't keep my toilet clean. We don't have hard water either.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner of this type I've found.
customer_reviews.text: The modern toilet in my apartment has very little water in the bowl. I use 2000 Flushes in a somewhat futile attempt to keep the bowl clean. Effective enough for the circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great product that actually works
customer_reviews.text: He's actually work! Wish I would have found them 20 years ago LOL
customer_reviews.author: drumlady

customer_reviews.title: Over priced for only one in the package.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought it I didn’t realize there was only one in the package. Way over priced for just one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the bowl clean for weeks without having to do anything. I didn’t check to see if I got 2000 flushes but it didn’t feel like it! Good product though still.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Smith

customer_reviews.title: mold is gone
customer_reviews.text: I had mold issue that keeps coming back no matter how often I cleaned. This took care of the problem and smell is barely noticeable (faint chlorine smell). Will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Tiny 1.25-oz item for $15.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, I expected more than bleach pressed into a small tablet to put in the tank. Embarrassed that someone drove a truck to the house for this. (Originally part of a larger order, but came separately, boxed.)
customer_reviews.author: Oneirophile

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS WORTHLESS! DID NOT CLEAN, DID NOT HAVE A SCENT, DID NOTHING! TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY! SO DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Wise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -No fumes or chemical order. -Prevents toilet rings. -Saves time as I don’t have to scrub toilet everyday. Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: catpaws

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: Was so happy to find this product on Amazon. Not going to Walmart during the pandemic and needed these badly for the main bathroom. Long lasting and keeps things fresher between cleanings.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH MCCAMMON

customer_reviews.title: Smashed to Bits!
customer_reviews.text: The toilet cake was smashed into little pieces, I bet it does not last 1000 flushes.
customer_reviews.author: Greycalico

customer_reviews.title: Smells Clean
customer_reviews.text: Small bleach chip that seems to last forever. Smells clean and keeps things clean. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I expected this item to keep ring from developing. Nope. Doesn't work like other brands. Very disappointed 😞 I don't even smell any bleach being dispersed.
customer_reviews.author: KY QT PIE

customer_reviews.title: not that much usefull but for one time you can try it...
customer_reviews.text: easy to use & not that much usefull but for one time you can try it...
customer_reviews.author: Srinivasa Rao

customer_reviews.title: Great for A Little Extra Cleaning in-between Cleanser and Scrubbing Bubbles Days
customer_reviews.text: 2/20/18: Delivered on time and in perfect condition -- the two of them. 2000 Flushes is a great product and such a simple idea. But it works!
customer_reviews.author: Shizue Leigh Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Working really well!
customer_reviews.text: These came today. I put them in the tanks this morning and I can already tell the bowls are cleaner. So impressed. I hope they last as long as they claim but even not worth the money so far!
customer_reviews.author: DiscoYoga

customer_reviews.title: Not to waste money
customer_reviews.text: It's the exact same product you can get at the dollar stores and it does not last any longer for the $5 price for one tablet. I could have gotten 3-5 at the dollar store for this one. The product itself works all right, but not at $5 a pop! Just be careful and review wisely.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Dawe

customer_reviews.title: The smell is not overpowering
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who is bother by strong scents, this tablet's odor is not enough to bother either of us in his household. Cannot use the other brand at all. It's way too strong.
customer_reviews.author: loves a mystery

customer_reviews.title: $12 for one tablet... what a shame 😔
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to learn that I paid $12 and change for just one tablet. I truly thought I was getting two tablets in the box for that $12. I won't make the same mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: Wan

customer_reviews.title: Fairly decent product.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product, because the plumbing in my apartment complex is old, so I was hoping this would help me from having to clean the toilet bowl all the time. While it did help clean some, I still had to scrub basically the same amount as I did before. I probably won't buy again, but it was a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: JERH

customer_reviews.title: still looking for a good product. I gave it 2 stars because though ...
customer_reviews.text: this did not keep the tank clean the was I though it would. I had a mildew smell in the top part of my toilet and it did nothing for that smell. still looking for a good product. I gave it 2 stars because though it did not help the smell I got a little comfort in knowing with every flush bleach is cleaning the water " i think: :)
customer_reviews.author: memyselfandI

customer_reviews.title: A clean bowl for....a long time
customer_reviews.text: Will it last 2000 flushes? I haven't made it there yet. But, every time I visit the satisfying burn of bleach tingles my nostrils, much preferable to urine or worse. Plops in the tank, lasts for a very long time, this certainly helps me clean the toilet less. Well worth it. Now, if only it could clean the floor, tub, and sink. That would be something!
customer_reviews.author: K. Small

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells absolutely disgusting! It does clean the toilet bowl but the smell is unbearable. Everytime we entered the bathroom, felt like throwing up! Had to throw it away after two days!
customer_reviews.author: Waleed Aslam

customer_reviews.title: We love 2000 flushes bleach
customer_reviews.text: We love 2000 flushes bleach. The blue one doesn't work, but the bleach one does. We have been having trouble finding the bleach one in the stores in Lincoln lately, so it was very helpful to find that at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Leupold

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your toilet clean and disease free
customer_reviews.text: Cut the top open, lift the septic tank lid and drop it in.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A Caddell Jr

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! No odors!
customer_reviews.text: Best toilet bowl cleaner of its kind. I've tried several. There is no poopy bleach odor. No smell at all. My boys no buildup. I thought this was expensive at first, but it's worth the price. Long lasting and makes it a cinch to keep the toilet bowl clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We had a little grime building up in a brand new toilet. Within 4 or 5 days, it was gone and I didn't even have to use the toilet brush. I'm in love LOL
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Goddess

customer_reviews.title: I hardly notice any effect, no color or odor ...
customer_reviews.text: I hardly notice any effect, no color or odor change in the water. But it is still there after more than one month using it. I hope it is working sanitizing the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea V

customer_reviews.title: Automatic bowl cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I hate cleaning my toilet bowl. But, with this product problem solved. I can flush and forget about it.
customer_reviews.author: Garfield S

customer_reviews.title: YUP.
customer_reviews.text: Keep the bowl clean. Itd be nice if this thing had some sort of coloration to it so that way you know when it is on the verge of needing replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Seduce & Destroy

customer_reviews.title: Works great no bleachy smell
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the bowl clean and doesnt have any odor but I wish it was blue that always makes me think its working.
customer_reviews.author: bmazing

customer_reviews.title: 🧠🧠
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but to lazy to drive to get one honestly. 😆
customer_reviews.author: DENTALPIC67

customer_reviews.title: I WOULD LOVE TO MEET THE TOILET WHERE ONE OF THESE PUCKS ...
customer_reviews.text: I WOULD LOVE TO MEET THE TOILET WHERE ONE OF THESE PUCKS LAST FOR 2,000 FLUSHES! ALL I CAN GET OUT OF MINE IS ABOUT 200 ..... IF I'M LUCKY.
customer_reviews.author: Wet Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Works well and lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: Keeps toilet bowl fresh and clean for weeks. I still clean the toilet with a brush as needed but this sure helps in between. This is the best "in tank" tablet I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: terblue22

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not 2000 flushes
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t keep the toilet ring from forming and didn’t last and dissolved rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Wn

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Keeps the toilet clean
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Keeps the toilet clean. A little pricey for a single cleaner. 2000 flushes is a lot but usually this type of product comes with three in a pack
customer_reviews.author: Will Morris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not have a strong odor (even in a very small bathroom). Lasted about 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reduces Mold
customer_reviews.text: Has helped us reduce mold that had been building up in our toilets.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First one that works and not expensive. Eliminates yellow ring. Lasts a long time as they advertise.
customer_reviews.author: downtown gal

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and Clean!
customer_reviews.text: These work great, I'm on my second one. It helps to keep the bowl sanitized and clean. I have a very sensitive nose and the smell of the bleach is barely noticeable. Saves time cleaning and makes your bowl fresh for a month!
customer_reviews.author: Life Part 1

customer_reviews.title: I don't think it lasted 2000 flushes, but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it lasted 2000 flushes, but I didn't count. Did the job though and prevented the limescale buildup.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: BEST TOILET CLEANER PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: 2000 FLUSHES is a FANTASTIC PRODUCT!!! FAST DELIVERY!!! THANKS!!! ⛄️🎄🎅
customer_reviews.author: victor greatrex

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it claims to. Keeps your toilet clean. Also just FYI makes your bathroom smell like bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: clear clean toilet water
customer_reviews.text: My store doesn't carry this anymore and only in blue in another brand.
customer_reviews.author: bjw

customer_reviews.title: CobsumerADVOCATE ADVISES CAUTION! IN USE
customer_reviews.text: This is best product to really disinfect bowl. ConsumerADVOCATE says use in newer toilets only. Clorine us destructive to metal chains and rubber stoppers in older toilets
customer_reviews.author: CONSUMER Advocate

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I worked but reacted with the Styrofoam liner inside of my toilet tank. It made the water turn brown.
customer_reviews.author: Crafter2

customer_reviews.title: Easy Clean
customer_reviews.text: This keeps toilet bowl clean. All it needs is a light brushing with scrubbing brush, and it’s done.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive only 1 count. There are products for lesser price with 4 to 6 refills.
customer_reviews.author: Anand Shukla

customer_reviews.title: Expected More
customer_reviews.text: While it does keep the bowl clean, it doesn't clean under the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Amity818

customer_reviews.title: Semi strong odor, but it works
customer_reviews.text: We can smell the bleach in the hall but it beats the dirty toilet. The cleaning part is a win.
customer_reviews.author: melissa sandel

product_meta.title: 2000 Flushes Bleach Automatic Toilet Bowl Cleaner, 1.25 OZ
product_meta.description: 2000 Flushes Bleach Automatic Toilet Bowl Cleaner, 1.25 OZMaintains your toilet bowl and keeps it clean and sanitary for up to 4 months. Improved formula uses powerful chlorine to bleach away stains to keep your toilet bowl continuously clean and sanitary. Keep your toilet fresh and clean while making your scrubbing easier. Easy to use -- No mess. Kills 99.9% of bacteria while keeping the bowl stain-free and deodorized. Use year-round or for special events to keep the water crystal clear with every flush
feature_bullets: 2000 Flushes Bleach Automatic Toilet Bowl Cleaner, 1.25 Oz
Maintains Your Toilet Bowl And Keeps It Clean And Sanitary For Up To 4 Months
Improved Formula Uses Powerful Chlorine To Bleach Away Stains To Keep Your Toilet Bowl Continuously Clean And Sanitary
Keep Your Toilet Fresh And Clean While Making Your Scrubbing Easier. Easy To Use -- No Mess
Kills 99.9% Of Bacteria While Keeping The Bowl Stain-Free And Deodorized
